title: Mohammed Ameur
text: Mohammed Ameur ( – born 1959, <a href="Debdou">Debdou</a>) is a Moroccan politician of the <a href="Socialist%20Union%20of%20Popular%20Forces">Socialist Union of Popular Forces</a>. Between 2007 and 2012, he held the position of "Minister-Delegate for the Moroccans Living Abroad" in the <a href="cabinet%20of%20Morocco">cabinet</a> of <a href="Abbas%20El%20Fassi">Abbas El Fassi</a>. He currently serves as the ambassador to Belgium.
